name: df-sad
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(csad, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(cn0), cpw(cn0), crab(s2, cn0, whad(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wcel(emptycls, cfv(cseq(nat0, cmpo(s3, s4, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(s4), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s4), cv(s1)), wcel(emptycls, cv(s3))))), cmpt(s5, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s5), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s5), nat0)))), cv(s2)))))))
comment: Define the addition of two bit sequences, using ~ df-had and ~ df-cad bit operations. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2016.)
